long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the past few weeks, we've been working on a whole new idea, a whole new expression for Savershot. We've been looking for an easy way to integrate everything you care about into your life. We wanted something that you could integrate into your web browser, phone home screen, and more, without effecting your devices performance. We wanted something that could control your home, and help your life be more simple, without making any important changes to the current powerful core of Savershot. The solution: Hub. Hub is a unique and beautiful piece of software. You can access Hub as easily as making a search... because you are making a search when you use Hub. All you do is search Savershot on mobile or desktop for "Hub" and you can access Hub. Hub combines both new and fan favorite features of Savershot Tabs. With Hub, you can control your Philips Hue smart lights, control your Nest thermostat, call a ride with Curb, and check in to your flights on American Airlines, Delta, United, and Turkish Airlines. Plus, all of your news is available right at your fingertips. 

LIGHTS
You can control your lights easily if you have a bridge and lights through Philips Hue. Searching for either "Philips", "myhue", or "lightbulb" will instantly get you to a Tab where you can control your lights, link your bridge, and buy new Hue products. The link is also available in Hub.

THERMOSTAT
Controlling your Nest thermostat with Hub is easy. Simply search for "Nest","Temperature", or "Thermostat", to get directly to the Tab that allows you to control your Nest. You can access your Nest Home online and buy new Nest products. In addition to directly searching for it, a link is available directly from Hub.

CAB
It's simple to call a cab with Hub. Simply search one of a couple of terms including "taxi please" and "car please" and click on the large icon labeled "Hire A Car With Curb." You'll then be redirected to Curb, a service which will allow you to hire a car easily and for free.
